jollyRoger: A skull with a fur hat and crossed swords

keyMoments.title: Law's Shichibukai Status Revealed
keyMoments.description: It is revealed that Law became a Shichibukai during the two-year time skip, affecting the Heart Pirates' status.
keyMoments.significance: Law's position as a Warlord grants the Heart Pirates protection from the World Government while he pursues his plans.

keyMoments.title: Crew Regroups on Punk Hazard
keyMoments.description: The scattered Straw Hat crew members reunite inside a building on Punk Hazard to share information.
keyMoments.significance: The crew comes together to coordinate their response to the mysteries and dangers of Punk Hazard.
